identity.philosophy: Swiss Utility - Function is Beauty. High contrast, precision, and clarity.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Fintech precision with Swiss Poster aesthetics.
Content is King: Data legibility is the top priority.
Negative Space: Use whitespace to group related data, not lines.
Contrast: Use weight and color to guide the eye, not just size.

usage.labels: IBM Plex Sans, uppercase, tracking-wider, text-xs, font-semibold

structure.sidebar: fixed left-0 top-0 h-full w-64 hidden md:flex flex-col

buttons.primary: bg-zinc-900 text-white hover:bg-zinc-800 rounded-md px-4 py-2 font-medium shadow-sm
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-zinc-900 border border-zinc-200 hover:bg-zinc-50 rounded-md px-4 py-2 font-medium
buttons.ghost: text-zinc-600 hover:text-zinc-900 hover:bg-zinc-100 rounded-md px-3 py-1.5

inputs.style: bg-white border border-zinc-200 rounded-md px-3 py-2 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-zinc-900 focus:border-transparent outline-none transition-all

tables.header: bg-zinc-50 text-zinc-500 uppercase tracking-wider font-semibold py-3 px-4

upload_zone.style: border-2 border-dashed border-zinc-300 rounded-xl p-12 text-center hover:border-zinc-400 hover:bg-zinc-50 transition-all cursor-pointer bg-zinc-50/30

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80 border-b border-white/20 (Use for sticky headers)
visual_enhancers.gradients: None. Use solid colors and subtle background patterns (dot grid) if needed.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Minimal. shadow-sm for dropdowns and modals only.

login_background.usage: Full screen background for login page with overlay

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Update tailwind.config.js to use the defined color palette (Zinc, Emerald, Amber, Rose, Sky).
3. LAYOUT: Create a 'DashboardLayout' component with the fixed sidebar and responsive header.
4. COMPONENTS: Build 'StatCard', 'DocumentTable', 'StatusBadge', 'UploadDropzone' using the design rules.
5. PAGES: Implement 'Dashboard', 'Upload', 'Documents', 'Users' pages following the 'Control Room' grid.
6. INTERACTION: Add hover states to all interactive elements. Use 'sonner' for notifications.
7. ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure all text meets contrast ratios. Use semantic HTML.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds.
Use 'IBM Plex Sans' for all body text and data.
Never use generic 'blue' for primary actions; use Zinc-900 (Black).
Status colors must be consistent: Green=Done, Yellow=In Progress, Red=Error, Blue=Uploaded.
